lines.text: declare new constant integer called M = 100 + 5
a is a new array of integers with size M by M
sr is an array of integers with M elements
sc is a new array of integers with size M
DUMMY
declare integer variable n
read standard input to n
in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: start for loop from j = 0 to n exclusive , read a [ i ] [ j ] from the input on each iteration
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { cin >> a [ i ] [ j ] ; }

lines.text: DUMMY
in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = 0 to n exclusive , change sr [ i ] to sr [ i ] + a [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { sr [ i ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; }

lines.text: DUMMY
for j from 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ )

lines.text: for i from 0 to n exclusive , change sc [ j ] to the sum of sc [ j ] and a [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sc [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; }

lines.text: DUMMY
declare integer variable with name ans = 0
in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: in a for loop , change j from 0 to n exclusive incrementing j
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ )

lines.text: if sc [ j ] is greater than sr [ i ] , increment ans
lines.code: if ( sc [ j ] > sr [ i ] ) { ans ++ ; }

lines.text: DUMMY
DUMMY
print ans
